Articles.Content: Hey guys - I run a YouTube channel with about 4500 subscribers, and just looking to get the word out. I've made a semi successful video regarding how to get to the Mun - and have just released a video on how to get to Minmus and back - I'm fairly new to the game myself - roughly 40 hours of gametime. ALOT for most other games but I think this still qualifies me as a KSP Noob. Please let me know what you think - and please show some support! (I apologize if this is in the wrong thread)
